entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 18.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm.
